channel.title: Can't run the client?
channel.description:
So, I just download a DDSSPECED source, and I edited everything etc. but when I tried to run the client the cmd window came up with this:
error occurred during initialization of vm could not reserve enough space for object heap could not create the java virtual machine. press any key to continue...
This is what I have as my run.bat:
@echo off COLOR 09 title Sativa Scape client java -Xmx2048m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause
If someone could help me out I'd appreciate it. I searched on Google, but I didn't find anything that helped. Thanks!

item.title: Can't run the client?
item.dc:creator: @eyeheartlax eyeheartlax
item.description:
@eyeheartlax wrote:

It’s DDSPECED, which is 317… Rofl, you didn’t have to list each one >_< thanks though. Let me know if you can help.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't run the client?
item.dc:creator: @eyeheartlax eyeheartlax
item.description:
@eyeheartlax wrote:

So, I just download a DDSSPECED source, and I edited everything etc. but when I tried to run the client the cmd window came up with this:

error occurred during initialization of vm
could not reserve enough space for object heap
could not create the java virtual machine.
press any key to continue…

This is what I have as my run.bat:

@echo off
COLOR 09
title Sativa Scape client
java -Xmx2048m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32
pause

If someone could help me out I’d appreciate it. I searched on Google, but I didn’t find anything that helped. Thanks!

Read full topic
